reviewText: Pretty cool Truck and Cars. A Cool kenworth Cabover with Custom Sleeper and a Kenworth Conventional daycab that shows up later. You also have "Paulie" from the Sopranos(Tony Sirico but he is Anthony Sirico in the Credits) Some good action but a bit boring at times. Still good 70s genre movie. and Fun. PLUS GEORGE BARRIS!
This is a great action comedy about a group of renegade CB runners trying to rob an armored vehicle. It's a must see!!
